typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Case no.} as string,
		{Report date} as string,
		{Date of onset} as string,
		Gender as string,
		Age as string,
		{Name of hospital admitted} as string,
		{Hospitalised/Discharged/Deceased} as string,
		{HK/Non-HK resident} as string,
		{Case classification*} as string,
		{Confirmed/probable} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 filter(toInteger(Age) >= 30) ~> Filter30OrAbove
Filter30OrAbove sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Covid30YearsAbove.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
